specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content: BEREN concentrates on villa developments in strategic Costa Blanca locations, particularly in the Sierra Cortina area. Their specialization in villa construction allows for larger plot sizes and greater architectural flexibility compared to apartment-based developments. Sierra Cortina represents an ideal backdrop for their developments, offering proximity to essential services while maintaining a residential character that distinguishes it from more built-up coastal areas.
